annotations.description: This is what football should look like. Full of action, thrilling moments and spectacular opportunities. The expectations for the next games will be high. annotations.description: The fans in the stadium won't regret buying tickets for today's game as they have witnessed a great game so far, and nothing suggests it's going to change in the second half. Great display from AS Roma so far, looking at stats you have to say that they were the better side during that opening 45 minutes. The home team's main weapon is fast counter-attacks, while the away side attempts to hold onto the ball for as long as possible.
